title: New Report Forecasts the Architectural Coatings Market in Asia-Pacific through 2019
text:
(MENAFN Press) Fast Market Research announces the availability of Technavio's new report "Architectural Coatings Market in APAC 2015-2019" on their comprehensive research portal.
Coatings are products used to protect a surface and/or enhance its appearance. Architectural coatings are applied to commercial and residential buildings. They protect a building from moisture UV radiation and microbes. Paints primers lacquers varnishes and stains are some of the primary types of architectural coating products. These are formulated using resins such as acrylic alkyds polyester and polyurethane. The market can be broadly classified into two major types of coating technologies: solvent-borne and water-borne.
Technavio's analysts forecast the architectural coatings market in APAC to grow at a CAGR of 5.76% over the period 2014-2019.

The report analyst commented "Vendors introduce unique colors and implement marketing communication programs to differentiate their products and attract buyers. The market is expected to witness increase in the use of different color combinations to enhance the esthetic appeal of the coated surface. Key vendors in the market are also focusing on introduction of metallic paints that end-users could deploy to highlight the surface."
According to the report durability of exterior coatings has always been a challenge for vendors in the global architectural coatings market. Vendors such as Axalta have been focusing on introduction of products for exterior applications such as façades. The company offers façade coatings with superior weather-resistance and mechanical properties. The product range comprises matt high-gloss and semi-gloss coatings in various textures such as metallic. There has been continuous innovation and increased R&D spending by vendors for introduction of high-performance façade coatings.
Further the report states that introduction of an increasing number of products with little product differentiation is restricting market growth.
The key players in the Architectural Coatings Market in APAC are Akzo Nobel Asian Paints Kansai Nippon Paint PPG and Valspar while other prominent vendors include Berger Paints Carpoly Culux Guangdong Maydos Jotun Shandong Shanghai Coatings and Yip’s.
The study was conducted using an objective combination of primary and secondary information including inputs from key participants in the industry. The report contains a comprehensive market and vendor landscape in addition to a SWOT analysis of the key vendors.
